00015 #ifndef _MBADATA_H_
00016 #define _MBADATA_H_
00017 
00018 #include <MBAtypedef.h>
00019 
00020 #include <vector>
00021 using namespace std;
00022 
00023 //===========================================================================
00036 //===========================================================================
00037 
00038 class MBAdata {
00039   friend class MBA;
00040   friend class MBAadaptive;
00041 
00042   double umin_, vmin_, umax_, vmax_; // possibly user defined (expanded)
00043 
00044   MBAbaseType  baseType_;  
00045   double offset_;
00046   std::vector<double> U_;
00047   std::vector<double> V_;
00048   std::vector<double> Zorig_;
00049         std::vector<double> Z_;
00050 
00051   void buildOffset();
00052   void buildBaseSurface();
00053 
00054   /*  Expand the rectangular domain beyond the domain of the given 
00055    *  scattered data; see doc in MBA.
00056    *  This must be done after data initialization.
00057    *  Note that this can only be used to expand the domain 
00058    *  (and not shrink it in any direction) 
00059    */
00060   void expandDomain(double Dumin, double Dvmin, double Dumax, double Dvmax) {
00061     umin_ -= Dumin; vmin_ -= Dvmin; umax_ += Dumax; vmax_ += Dvmax;}
00062 
00063   // Clear all allocated memory
00064   void clear() {U_.clear(); V_.clear(); Z_.clear(); Zorig_.clear();}
00065 
00066   // Non-const for class MBA
00067   vector<double>& Z() {return Z_;};
00068 
00069 public:
00070         MBAdata() {baseType_ = MBA_ZERO; offset_ = 0.0;}
00071         ~MBAdata() {}
00072 
00074   void init(std::vector<double>& U, std::vector<double>& V, std::vector<double>& Z);
00075   
00077   const double& umin() const {return umin_;}
00079   const double& vmin() const {return vmin_;}
00081   const double& umax() const {return umax_;}
00083   const double& vmax() const {return vmax_;}
00084 
00085   // Access to scattered data
00086   const vector<double>& U() const {return U_;};
00087   const vector<double>& V() const {return V_;};
00088   const vector<double>& Zorig() const {return Zorig_;};
00089   const vector<double>& Z() const {return Z_;}; // also non-const private members
00090   double U(int i) const {return U_[i];};
00091   double V(int i) const {return V_[i];};
00092 
00094         int size() const {return U_.size();}
00095 
00097         void readScatteredData(char filename[]);
00098 
00099   // Evaluator.
00100   // Assumes that the base surface is a constant
00101   inline double f() const {return offset_;}
00102 };
00103 
00104 #endif //_MBADATA_H_
